FixEntity.Description:
bstone v1.2.12-2 https://github.com/bibendovsky/bstone
BStone is unofficial source port for "Blake Stone" game series: "Aliens Of Gold" and "Planet Strike".
Features:
High resolution vanilla rendering 3D-rendering Upscale texture filter Support for external textures Allows to customize control bindings 3D-audio Separate volume control of sound effects and music
FixEntity.Name: bstone

FixEntity.Description:
bstone v1.2.12-2 https://github.com/bibendovsky/bstone

FixEntity.Description:
Cold Fear Widescreen Fix https://github.com/ThirteenAG/WidescreenFixesPack/releases/tag/coldfear
Fixed Resolution Fixed HUD Fixed Field of View Fixed FMVs Added an option to disable cutscene borders Added an option to make FMVs fullscreen
FixEntity.Name: Widescreen Fix

FixEntity.Description:
DSFix v2.4 https://www.nexusmods.com/darksouls/mods/19
DSfix is a wrapper .dll that allows your to adjust Dark Souls' rendering resolution, improve the quality of the game's DoF effect, add SSAO and SMAA, hide and show the mouse cursor and hud using a toggle key, take screenshots, periodically back up your save game, change the game's language, load texture mods and more.
Morten242s UI for DSfix https://www.nexusmods.com/darksouls/mods/45
Allows for easy, understandable editing of the DSfix configuration without having to mess around directly with the configuration file.
FixEntity.Name: DSFix

FixEntity.Description:
Dead Space Mouse Fix https://community.pcgamingwiki.com/files/file/840-dead-space-mouse-fix/
This fix makes Dead Space use raw mouse input without any additional smoothing or acceleration. It works with VSync and high frame rates and is easy to install without having to fiddle around with FPS limiters or config files.
FixEntity.Name: Mouse Fix

FixEntity.Description:
Dead Space 2 Mouse Fix https://community.pcgamingwiki.com/files/file/976-dead-space-2-mouse-fix/
This fix makes Dead Space 2 use raw mouse input without any additional smoothing or acceleration. It works with VSync and high frame rates and is easy to install without having to fiddle around with FPS limiters or config files.
FixEntity.Name: Mouse Fix

FixEntity.Description:
Crispy Doom 6.0 https://github.com/fabiangreffrath/crispy-doom
Crispy Doom is a friendly fork of Chocolate Doom that provides a higher display resolution, removes the static limits of the Doom engine and offers further optional visual, tactical and physical enhancements while remaining entirely config file, savegame, netplay and demo compatible with the original.
Doom 2 Minor Sprite Fixing Project - v2.0 https://www.doomworld.com/forum/topic/62403-doom-2-minor-sprite-fixing-project-v20-release-updated-112822/

FixEntity.Description:
Rigel Engine v0.9.1 https://github.com/lethal-guitar/RigelEngine
This project is a re-implementation of the game Duke Nukem II.
Compared to running the original in an emulator, RigelEngine offers many modern enhancements and usability improvements, including:
wide-screen mode smooth scrolling & movement mode with increased frame rate quick saving improved game controller support extended modding features
FixEntity.Name: Rigel Engine

FixEntity.Description: Fix for mouse cursor being stuck in attack mode. Exe file taken from the GOG version.

FixEntity.Description:

FixEntity.Description:
ColAccel v1.5 https://github.com/ThirteenAG/IV.EFLC.ColAccel
ColAccel is a .asi plugin for GTA IV and EFLC which creates a 'colCache.dat' file on the first load, containing all the data actually used by the game from the collision meshes and accelerating your game load time by 50% or more.

FixEntity.Description:
Mafia Widescreen Fix by ThirteenAG https://github.com/ThirteenAG/WidescreenFixesPack/releases/tag/mafia
Fixed Aspect Ratio Fixed HUD Fixed Field of View Fixed FMVs Added an option to increase draw distance Added an option to change fps limit Added an option to fix issue with settings Added an option to make windowed mode borderless Added an option to set deadzone for left stick and right stick on gamepad (otherwise camera just spins on its own)
FixEntity.Name: Widescreen Fix

FixEntity.Description:
IndirectSound 0.20 https://github.com/kcat/dsoal
This project is for a DirectSound DLL replacement. It implements the DirectSound interfaces by translating the calls to OpenAL, and fools applications into thinking there is a hardware accelerated sound device. EAX is also implemented (up to version 4) by using OpenAL's EAX extension, allowing for environmental reverb with sound obstruction and occlusion effects.
FixEntity.Name: Audio Fix

FixEntity.Description:
Widescreen fix by ThirteenAG https://github.com/ThirteenAG/WidescreenFixesPack/releases/tag/mp1
Fixed Aspect Ratio Fixed HUD Fixed Field of View Fixed FMVs Adjustable FOV via ini Added an option to make graphic novels fullscreen Added an option to disable cutscene borders Added an option to load save game automatically on startup Added an option to change save game directory Added an option to keep the game running on minimize
FixEntity.Name: Widescreen Fix

FixEntity.Description:
Widescreen fix by ThirteenAG https://github.com/ThirteenAG/WidescreenFixesPack/releases/mp2
Fixed Aspect Ratio Fixed HUD Fixed Field of View Fixed FMVs Adjustable FOV via ini Added an option to make graphic novels fullscreen Added an option to disable cutscene borders Added an option to load save game automatically on startup Added an option to change save game directory Added an option to keep the game running on minimize

FixEntity.Description:
Ultimate ASI Loader v5.2 https://github.com/ThirteenAG/Ultimate-ASI-Loader
This is a DLL file which adds ASI plugin loading functionality to any game.
FixEntity.Name: ASI Loader

FixEntity.Description:
FusionFix v1.4 https://github.com/ThirteenAG/MaxPayne3.FusionFix
This is a small project intended to add ability to hide skip button in Max Payne 3. Additionally, added an option to increase the size of subtitle text outlines and prevent Hoboken Alleys coop map from crashing the game.
REQUIRES ASI Loader
FixEntity.Name: Fusion Fix

FixEntity.Description:
Max Payne 3 Fix v1.0 https://github.com/Lyall/MaxPayne3Fix
This is a fix for several issues with ultrawide/wider displays in Max Payne 3.
Corrects >2.3 aspect ratios causing the game to enter multi-monitor mode. Stops fullscreen mode from using your highest-available resolution. (Thanks Rose!) Correctly scaled FMV playback. Correctly scaled loading screens. Spanned or centred 16:9 HUD adjustment. Gameplay FOV adjustment without affecting cutscenes/other camera types.
REQUIRES ASI Loader
FixEntity.Name: Ultrawide Fix

FixEntity.Description: Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time v1.0.0.1 http://ps2wide.net/pc.html#popst
FixEntity.Name: Widescreen Fix

FixEntity.Description:
No Black Bars v1.01 https://www.nexusmods.com/reddeadredemption2/mods/349
Script Hook RDR2 v1.0.1491.17 http://dev-c.com/rdr2/scripthookrdr2/
Removes the black bars appearing top, bottom, left, & right especially during cutscenes for ultrawide owners (21:9).
FixEntity.Name: No Black Bars

FixEntity.Description:
re4_tweaks v1.9.1 https://github.com/nipkownix/re4_tweaks
A project designed to fix and tweak the "UHD" port of Resident Evil 4 on Steam.
FixEntity.Name: re4_tweaks

FixEntity.Description:
RE5Fix v1.0.4 https://github.com/Lyall/RE5Fix
This is a DLL hook that fixes various issues with Resident Evil 5 relating to ultrawide support and more.
FOV adjustment. Uncap 120 FPS limit. Remove yellow colour filter. Adjust shadow quality. Remove 4096x4096 resolution limit. Fixed UI scaling using ultrawide. Fixed ERROR 09: Unsupported Function crash using ultrawide. Fixed stretched movie playback.
FixEntity.Name: RE5Fix

FixEntity.Description:
Resident Evil 6 Fusion Fix https://github.com/ThirteenAG/WidescreenFixesPack/releases/tag/re6
Makes local split-screen coop mode fullscreen Added UltraWide support Some on-screen effects will be disabled in coop and UltraWide (damage, blood etc) Unlocks FPS when FRAME RATE option is set to VARIABLE Added an option to skip intro Added an option to enable borderless windowed mode
FixEntity.Name: Fusion Fix

FixEntity.Description:
REFramework v1.5.1
Removes pillarboxing and extends FOV in ultrawide resolutions
FixEntity.Name: Ultrawide Fix

FixEntity.Description:
Resident Evil Revelations Fusion Fix https://github.com/ThirteenAG/WidescreenFixesPack/releases/tag/rerev
Unlocks all available display resolutions Unlocks FPS when FRAME RATE option is set to VARIABLE Added UltraWide support FMVs are stretched in UltraWide Added an option to disable damage overlay Added an option to enable borderless windowed mode Added an option to increase FOV
FixEntity.Name: Fusion Fix

FixEntity.Description:
RERevFix v1.0 https://github.com/Lyall/RERevFix
This is a DLL hook that fixes various issues with Resident Evil Revelations relating to ultrawide support and more.
Support for ultrawide/custom resolutions. FOV adjustment. Uncap 120 FPS limit. Adjust shadow quality.
Warning This game uses Valve Anti Cheat for raid mode in multiplayer. I highly recommend that you DO NOT play this mode with this fix installed.
FixEntity.Name: RERevFix

FixEntity.Description:
Resident Evil Revelations 2 Fusion Fix https://github.com/ThirteenAG/WidescreenFixesPack/releases/tag/rerev2
Makes local split-screen coop mode fullscreen Unlocks all available display resolutions Unlocks FPS when FRAME RATE option is set to VARIABLE Added UltraWide support Some on-screen effects will be disabled in coop and UltraWide (damage, blood etc) FMVs are stretched in UltraWide Fixes a game breaking bug in episode 4, where player's controls get stuck before the final boss battle Added an option to skip intro Added an option to disable damage overlay Added an option to disable film grain Added an option to enable borderless windowed mode Added an option to increase FOV
FixEntity.Name: Fusion Fix

FixEntity.Name: Widescreen Fix

FixEntity.Description:
The Force Engine v1.09.410 https://theforceengine.github.io/
The Force Engine is a project with the goal to reverse engineer and rebuild the Jedi Engine for modern systems and the games that used that engine - Dark Forces and Outlaws. The project will include modern, built-in tools, such as a level editor and will make it easy to play Dark Forces and Outlaws on modern systems as well as the many community mods designed to work with the original games.
FixEntity.Name: The Force Engine

Restores the correct loading screens displayed between Kalinatek and Chinese Embassy from the leaked Xbox prototype.

Affected levels include Defense Ministry and CIA HQ.

FixEntity.Description:
Oldunreal's 227 Patch https://www.oldunreal.com/downloads/unreal/oldunreal-patches/
This patch was made to offer all Unreal players a new, completely overworked and fixed version for our old "love". Although the main target was bugfixing, many improvements have been made and a lot of additions found their way into this new version. The general gameplay and the game itself was not touched and it should remain 100% compatible to old mods and maps.
FixEntity.Name: 227 Patch
